reviewText: Excellen resource for teaching creative movement.  I've use this for many years for my pedagogy class at Mercyhurst University.  Thank you so much Melissa.  Fantastic!!!

My son and his friend really enjoy dancing along with this video.  I think it's amazing how she keeps the kids entertained.  I haven't tried any other fitness dvds with my son, but he asks for this one all the time.  He is almost 3.
I am a big buyer of DVD's for my children. I simply was not impressed with this one.
